title: Lessinhu
author: Lessinhu
content: Recently, I found dash2trader on coinsniper. The project seems to have good support, and the attention on twitter is about 42K. The time to create an account is not very long. At present, the project is mainly used as a monitoring platform to provide strategic support for investors in the pre-sale stage. The community on telegram would like to invite everyone to discuss whether it is worth investing in. The official website is https://dash2trade.com/

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Lessinhu on November 30, 2022, 05:53:13 PMRecently, I found dash2trader on coinsniper. The project seems to have good support, and the attention on twitter is about 42K. The time to create an account is not very long. At present, the project is mainly used as a monitoring platform to provide strategic support for investors in the pre-sale stage. The community on telegram would like to invite everyone to discuss whether it is worth investing in. The official website is https://dash2trade.com/The fact it has attention to twitter at this point is a bad sign in overall. It either means that people are paid to tweet about it and are about to sell their reward tokens as soon as they can, or there are more people looking for referrals or people are desperate to create hype so they can sell their tokens once they are in the free market.Also as a rule of thumb: anyone who funds their project trough lbank and bitmart are new in here and don't know what they are doing.And then there is this: Scam accusation link

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on December 02, 2022, 06:09:25 PMQuote from: Lessinhu on November 30, 2022, 05:53:13 PMRecently, I found dash2trader on coinsniper. The project seems to have good support, and the attention on twitter is about 42K. The time to create an account is not very long. At present, the project is mainly used as a monitoring platform to provide strategic support for investors in the pre-sale stage. The community on telegram would like to invite everyone to discuss whether it is worth investing in. The official website is https://dash2trade.com/The fact it has attention to twitter at this point is a bad sign in overall. It either means that people are paid to tweet about it and are about to sell their reward tokens as soon as they can, or there are more people looking for referrals or people are desperate to create hype so they can sell their tokens once they are in the free market.Also as a rule of thumb: anyone who funds their project trough lbank and bitmart are new in here and don't know what they are doing.And then there is this: Scam accusation linkThis kind of project was mentioning bitmart and lbank to create the hype. Some shit scam projects were doing it caused by when that site was mentioning if it will be listed on exchange site and that's pretty much the same like that site was manipulating people's mind about the potential return once the token already listed. I don't know why people are still investing in this stupid scam token. The pre sale mechanism that used by that site was very similar with old mechanism that used by any icos back in 2017 - 2018. It seems like that so many dumb investors were lacking knowledge about what they should invest in. A bit surprised that kind of project able to raise multi millions of USD.

The official website is https://dash2trade.com/yeah , coming from an account that sole created for this thread? seemingly a advertising purposes to boost this project and for me? a cheap way of advertising is already a flag on why we must not invest in any of these.why not use a proper way of luring investors than this one that only damage the reputation of the project.Quote from: o48o on December 02, 2022, 06:09:25 PMAnd then there is this: Scam accusation linkNice sharing of this mate, before i read your post this is also my assumption because the way this thread created .

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on December 02, 2022, 06:09:25 PMQuote from: Lessinhu on November 30, 2022, 05:53:13 PMRecently, I found dash2trader on coinsniper. The project seems to have good support, and the attention on twitter is about 42K. The time to create an account is not very long. The community on telegram would like to invite everyone to discuss whether it is worth investing in. The official website is https://dash2trade.com/The fact it has attention to twitter at this point is a bad sign in overall. It either means that people are paid to tweet about it and are about to sell their reward tokens as soon as they can, or there are more people looking for referrals or people are desperate to create hype so they can sell their tokens once they are in the free market.Also as a rule of thumb: anyone who funds their project trough lbank and bitmart are new in here and don't know what they are doing.And then there is this: Scam accusation linkYes and it's all over google as well, when I try to search for like the next hype, this Dash2Trade suddenly pops up.But I didn't do my research because I was not interested on it though, but thanks to this link, it seems that it save me precious time to research it myself. So it's a hype project nothing more, nothing less and then there is this scam accusation, so not really looking good for this project. Or maybe the OP is shilling for it?

I will take my trust out for this one.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: OP isn't serious with what he's asking. It's very likely that he's one of the people behind that website. Look, the first post he made is just all about making it look like that he's asking even with a link.It's more a shill than a question.We've seen and got enough with this way of marketing and it will take forever for OP to comeback and say even a thanks if it's a legitimate question.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on December 04, 2022, 10:35:30 PMOP isn't serious with what he's asking. It's very likely that he's one of the people behind that website. Look, the first post he made is just all about making it look like that he's asking even with a link.It's more a shill than a question.We've seen and got enough with this way of marketing and it will take forever for OP to comeback and say even a thanks if it's a legitimate question.Likely just to appear somewhere and just some SEO strategy but likely just a project to snatch money to the hands of investors. I really don't trust projects that are just being promoted by these shillers and promoters in twitter, it's just like cheating the system to create hype. You have that thousands and millions of followers yet only a few are able to interact on your posts. Nah, not buying it. As much as I admire projects that are being built even in the bear market but with a twitter page that is sharing "we're about to sold out", and always contest and giveaways without making a good content to show what's their edge over others isn't worth it. I think we've seen enough of this social trading projects and this one is likely not to be on the long term even if they raised that much amount.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Outside from having those engagement what and what do you think is pleasing about the project and do they have an ANN thread over here?In my recommendation and conclusion do not invest in a project due to media handle or telegram community how large they seems to be as because that may not finally justify them. It is best you have their website pasted here And I believe there are some individuals who would like go into findings to know about them.
